description:
Jasmine Crockett decided to waste everyone's time by pretending to care about our judicial system, but Rep. Darrell Issa had the receipts.

Not too long ago, Crockett supported the impeachment of Justices Samuel Alito and Clarence Thomas because she despises their rulings. So, rather than respect our judicial process, even when something does not go her way, she would rather go after judges she does not like. This makes it extremely comical, yet deeply pathetic, that she went on a two-minute rant to pretend she cared about any of this.

Behold, the Dems rising star:


🔥Jasmine Crockett starts H
title: Jasmine Crockett goes on unhinged rant about law and order, until a GOP Rep reminds her who she wanted to impeach

description:
Elie Mystal spoke with the ladies on The View to promote his new book Bad Law: Ten Popular Laws That Are Ruining America, and it’s worse than you think.


Elie Mystal says get rid of every law prior to 1965: "Why give a fck about laws old white males did?" pic.twitter.com/bwtsOs3wcu
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) April 1, 2025

title: Woke author demands all laws before 1965 be rescinded: "We were, functionally, an apartheid country"

description:

title: Karoline Leavitt shuts down a snippy press, reminding them just how VIOLENT and CRIMINAL the MS-13 gang is

description:
They say don’t commit the crime if you don’t have the time, but the City of San Francisco does not care about that, as they would rather increase punishment solely because of the income system.

The Speed Safety System Pilot Program has officially launched in San Francisco, and speeding cameras will now fine drivers. That’s bad enough, but a new state law allows cities to decrease or increase punishment based on income status.

San Francisco is launching the Speed Safety System Pilot Program, which will issue speeding tickets in an "equitable fashion" based on income.

The program was signed by Gov. Newsom in October 2023. The program sets speeding violation fines between $50 and $500.

However,… pic.twitter.com/0H1
title: Progressive city will now give out speeding tickets based on your "equity"

description:
If there is no such thing as men “participating in women’s sports,” why is the ACLU fighting to enforce that? That is something Chase Strangio will never be able to answer, but she will still try to make that foolish claim.

Strangio, who also happens to identify as a trans man, claims there is not one instance where men have competed against women or even attempted to. Her statements come after a UN study that revealed over 900 medals were awarded to males in women’s divisions.

Transgender ACLU lawyer claims there are
title: Trans ACLU Lawyer says ignore the science because there's no such thing as men playing women's sports

description:

STRANGIO THINGS

title: Sources: What this Anti-American Jew Said Will Make You Angry

description:
In the history of numbskullery in the journalisming history, batty Leslie Stahl from 60 Minutes asked quite possibly the dumbest question I've ever heard. It was so offensively bad I'm almost speechless, which I recognize is an odd way to start a blog post containing words and opinions. In an interview with a freed Israeli hostage, she asked him if maaaaaaybe Hamas could have had an understandable reason for starving him.

Quick recap: On October 7th, 2023, Israel was the victim of a heinous terrorist attack at the hands of Hamas. On October 8th, 2023, progressives in progressive cities throughout America started rallying that the Jews were asking for it (I
title: "60 Minutes" old crone challenges freed Israeli hostage, that maybe Hamas had a good excuse for starving him
